activities: Day trip to Half Moon Bay beaches
Visit local farmerâ€™s markets in Berkeley or Palo Alto
Picnic at Vasona Lake County Park
Check out small towns like Los Gatos and Pescadero
accommodation: Budget-friendly hostel in Palo Alto or Fremont, or campsite reservation in a state park
transportation: Clipper Card (public transit for buses/trains) + optional day-of-use car rental for countryside spots
estimated_budget: $300 total (public transit: ~$50, hostel/campsite: ~$120-$150, food/markets: ~$60-$80, activities: free or minimal cost)
notes: Pack light, bring reusable water bottles/snacks for hikes, and check transit schedules in advance. Hostel/camping booking early is recommended for lower cost. Farmers markets are busiest on weekends.
